name: Mistral Small 3 (2501)
description: Mistral Small 3 released January 2025. 24B parameters, latency-optimized with 50% price reduction. 81% MMLU accuracy, 150 tokens/sec.
notes: Released under Apache 2.0. Major performance improvements with 32K context. Superseded by mistral-small-2503 with multimodal capabilities.
